name: Acceptance Criteria - 205.03(a) Sound rock fragments with at least  2 x broken or angular faces each Test 10 pieces > 100mm for point Load Strength Is(50) of 2.0MPA or better.
Acceptance Criteria - Post compaction grading complies with the Limits of Grading ion Table 205.031.
Inspection Frequency - Prior and/or During Works
Acceptance Criteria - Geotextiles used in rock fill shall have G robustness rating greater than 3000.
Inspection Frequency - Prior to placing initial rock layer
Records to attach - Specification sheet, roll label and manufacturers test report.
Acceptance Criteria - The Contractor shall not commence placing any fill on the prepared areas until the area has been reviewed by the Superintendent.
Inspection Frequency - Prior to Fill Placement
Acceptance Criteria - For each material type and grading, the first and second layer shall be trialled:
– Rolled for the greater of - until no further consolidation, or 15 passes.
– Be surveyed after each roller pass, measure minimum of 20 points.
– Engineer / Supervisor / QAV review survey results to determine the number of passes before refusal occurs.
Inspection Frequency - Prior to Fill Placement
Records to attach - HP Release, consolidation record
Acceptance Criteria - Proceed with placement and compaction in accordance with the approved procedure. Maintain layer thicknesses and material size in accordance with 2.2, 2.3 and 2.4 above.
Records to attach - Placement and compaction record
Acceptance Criteria - Survey each layer for conformance with tolerance. +/- 100mm Intermediate layers
Acceptance Criteria - Undertake test roll for each layer as per Section 173. Rectify any identified failed areas.
Acceptance Criteria - Material size and layer thickness per Table 205.051, Test Roll each layer
Records to attach - Test roll record
Acceptance Criteria - Survey final layer for conformance with tolerance. +0mm / - 100mm
Acceptance Criteria - Geotextiles used in rock fill shall have G robustness rating greater than 3000.
Inspection Frequency - Prior to placing initial rock layer
Records to attach - Specification sheet, roll label and manufacturers test report.
